Articles.Content:
Hey, i'm really happy to have found this forum !

I just have one question : will the moderation before posting always be there or is it just because I am new?

Only for your first 5 posts then the next time the hourly script runs you will be bumped to regular member status.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Welcome to the non-stop train of explosions.
